name: Undercutting extremism with absurdity
description: Taika Waititi's satirical performance as Adolf Hitler in Jojo Rabbit connects to a number of other portrayals that includes ill-fated (and conceived) TV shows, memes, high camp and cinema classics.

constellations_other.name: Atari’s Basketball
constellations_other.description: Released in 1979, just in time for the arcade heydays of the early 1980s, Atari’s Basketball was the first basketball game to use a trackball as the input mechanic and a 45-degree angled side view. This set the standard for basketball games that followed.

links.description: ‘The Hitler Finds Out About…’ meme involves recaptioning one of the final scenes from Downfall, where actor Bruno Ganz portrays Hitler reacting furiously to news that Germany is soon to be defeated.
